name: Mediterranean Crescent Pinwheels
author: Anonymous
summary: Mediterranean flavors burst through layers of pastry in these pretty pinwheels.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls or Pillsbury® Crescent Recipe Creations™ refrigerated flaky dough sheet
½ pound prosciutto or cooked ham, thinly sliced
directions: Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray
If using crescent rolls: Unroll dough; separate dough into 4 rectangles
Press or roll each to form 8x5-inch rectangle
If using dough sheet: Unroll dough; cut into 4 rectangles
Press or roll each to form an 8x5-inch rectangle
Arrange 1/4 of prosciutto slices evenly over each rectangle
In small bowl, mix cheese, pepper and oil
Sprinkle mixture evenly over prosciutto on each rectangle
Starting at short side of each rectangle, roll up; seal long edges
With serrated knife, cut each roll into 5 slices
Place, cut side up, on cookie sheets
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown
